Attributes.description: Mining Engineering design project from scope definition to final design and project feasibility. Based on a problem from industry and/or research.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of MINE 302, MINE 303, MINE 304, MINE 310, MINE 331, MINE 333, MINE 350, MINE 396. (Fourth-year standing in Mining Engineering is required.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Fri, Start Time: 10:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: Orchard, Room: Commons
